name: Pippin' Hot
description:
A short puzzle game for the vimjam 3

Each ball bounces 3 times, and you only have a limit of 5 balls per level!

Also, you only have a limited number of shots per level, so use them wisely!

Controls:

  • Spacebar to charge shot
  • Release to shoot
  • Shots are aimed at your mouse
  • Left/Right to change lid type
  • Zoom the camera with the scrollwheel
